item.title: Vivimed Labs Stock Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Weak Financial Indicators
item.description: Vivimed Labs Ltd has declined to a fresh 52-week low, closing at ₹17.58 on 31 Dec 2025, marking a significant drop amid subdued financial performance and deteriorating key metrics over the past year. Time: 9 minutes ago

item.title: Kiri Industries Ltd Hits Intraday High with 10.13% Surge on 31 Dec 2025
item.description: Kiri Industries Ltd recorded a robust intraday performance on 31 Dec 2025, surging 10.13% to touch a day’s high of Rs 666, significantly outperforming its sector and broader market indices amid heightened volatility and sustained buying momentum. Time: 18 minutes ago

item.title: Vodafone Idea Ltd. Hits Day Low Amidst Price Pressure on 31 Dec 2025
item.description: Vodafone Idea Ltd. experienced a notable decline today, hitting its day low of Rs. 12.8 as the stock faced significant price pressure. Despite a broader market rally, the telecom services company underperformed its sector and the benchmark Sensex, reflecting immediate selling pressures and subdued market sentiment. Time: 32 minutes ago

item.title: Supreme Industries Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Rising Market Momentum
item.description: Supreme Industries Ltd, a key player in the Plastic Products - Industrial sector, witnessed a notable 14.1% surge in open interest in its derivatives segment on 31 Dec 2025, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. item.title: Nirman Agri Genetics Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Robust Buying Pressure
item.description: Nirman Agri Genetics Ltd surged to hit its upper circuit limit on 31 Dec 2025, registering a robust daily gain of 4.92% and signalling intense buying interest despite subdued investor participation. The stock closed at ₹62.7, near its high of ₹62.9, reflecting strong demand that outpaced supply and triggered a regulatory freeze on further upward price movement. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Simbhaoli Sugars Ltd Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Simbhaoli Sugars Ltd witnessed a significant surge in its share price on 31 Dec 2025, hitting the upper circuit limit as strong buying interest propelled the stock to its maximum daily gain.
